author: Reuters Editorial
title: Turkey will 'thwart games against it' and see strong growth, Erdogan says
text:
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday Turkey will achieve high economic growth in 2018 and will keep its door “wide open” to international investors.
FILE PHOTO: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan speaks during a meeting in Ankara, Turkey March 9, 2018. Kayhan Ozer/Presidential Palace/Handout via REUTERS “I have bad news for those trying to use exchange rates as bogeymen to scare our people,” Erdogan told members of his ruling AK Party. “Turkey will once again thwart the games being played against it with the high growth it will reach in 2018.”
Reporting by Tuvan Gumrukcu; Writing by Ezgi Erkoyun
